column4: have vista/9.10 partitioned for dual boot. but cannot boot into ubuntu partition, if i try reinstalling and go into the linux partitioner, it sees the existing 9.10 installation, just wont boot?
is it a grub problem?  Sounds like you installed windows after ubuntu, which could mean it overwrote he grub menu
vista first, i can boot from cd and see that grub is instaled
